Header: 11 Div New GOC Receives Blessings from Mahanayake Theros
Content: The newly-appointed General Officer Commanding of the 11 Division in Pallekele, Major General Senarath Bandara made offerings to the Temple of Tooth Relic in Kandy on Monday (15) and received the blessings from the Mahanayake Theras (prelates) of Malwathu and Asgiriya Chapters after calling on them at respective monasteries. Major General Bandara offered 'Atapirikara' to both of them and received blessings. Several Senior Officers of the 11 Division joined the occasion.
